title: DreamMe Announces Launch Offering a Smartphone Companion
text: DreamMe Announces Launch Offering a Smartphone Companion That Allows its Users to see the Time and Other Info on the Ceiling While in Bed , 29 September 2015 -- For people who love to get the most functionality out of their smartphones a new device is causing great excitement. Enter DreamMe, a device that works along with the DreamMe app to project selected smartphone information on the ceiling while the user is in bed. Smartphone enthusiasts couldn't be more pleased with the news.Many people use their smartphones as an alarm clock substitute, and in many ways they take care of the job well. One area where they lack, is a person having to pick the phone up to see what the time currently is. DreamMe is a new device that elegantly solves this problem. DreamMe works with a smartphone to project the time and other info onto the ceiling making it the perfect sleep companion.“DreamMe is a game changer for people who love to have their smartphone at bedside and use it as an alarm clock, or want to stay plugged into other information while catching some rest,” commented a spokesperson from the company. “It's simple to use and really has caused people's jaws to drops it’s so functional. We're really excited about having the chance to exceed our customer's expectations.” According to the company, DreamMe can work with nearly every smartphone and the accompanying app, which is necessary to run DreamMe properly, is available for both iOS and Android. DreamMe recently ran a very successful Kickstarter campaign, that they are happy to report ended completely funded. DreamMe works while a smartphone is charging to project parts of the display onto the ceiling. The app works to make sure the right information is projected and displayed properly, with easily read contrast and focus. In addition to being a “projection alarm clock”, a user can also have the display feature new messages, as well weather reports, depending on their needs and desires. The lens of DreamMe is made to the highest standards to ensure quality is high and dependable. Two colors are available, colored focus rings in orange and green can be used to customize DreamMe. For more information, check the current running IndieGoGo campaign http://tiny.cc/indiedreamme or visit http://dreamme.de . Videos are available at Vimeo: https://vimeo.com/channels/970691 # # #
